title: See U in Singapore｜AI与GPT创新
digest:
SeeDAO致力于成为一座连接 100 万 Web3 游民的数字城邦。我们相信，通过数字技术和去中心化的组织方式，可以建立一个更加公正、开放和高效的社会，通过共同合作和利用我们集体的专业知识和资源，让每个人都可以发挥自己的潜力，创造自己的价值。

在这个大背景下，SeeDAO新加坡计划于23年7月28号周五晚6点30到9点，在OGBC Incubator新加坡办公室组织“AI与GPT创新”主题的线下交流，邀请嘉宾来自Wireframe Designer、BubbleTeach和出门问问。

🗓️活动Agenda
6:30PM-6:50PM Registration

6:50PM-6:55PM Opening speech about OGBC & ScalingX Introduction

6:55PM-7:00PM SeeDAO Introduction

7.00PM-7:20PM Keynote speech 1 from Wireframe Designer Founder, Chenmu Wu

7:20PM-7:40PM Keynote speech 2 from BubbleTeach Founder, Stain Lu

7:40PM-8:00PM Keynote speech 3 from Mobvoi Project Development Manager, Ivy

8:00PM-9:0PM QA & Networking

Supported by the Singapore Global Network (SGN), a division under Singapore Economic Development Board (EDB). In SGN, we are passionate about building relationships and connecting with individuals all over the globe. Check us out at https://singaporeglobalnetwork.gov.sg
